description: Detects loading of essential DLLs used by PowerShell, but not by the process powershell.exe. Detects behaviour similar to meterpreter's "load powershell" extension.
author: Tom Kern
oscd.community
Natalia Shornikova
Tim Shelton
Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g)
OTR (Open Threat Research)
false_positives: Used by some .NET binaries, minimal on user workstation.
Used by Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio
name: PowerShell Core DLL Loaded By Non PowerShell Process
query: ((((winlog.event_data.Description:"System.Management.Automation") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"System.Management.Automation.dll") OR (dll.path:(*\\System.Management.Automation.dll OR *\\System.Management.Automation.ni.dll))) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:("*\:\\Program\ Files\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\dsac.exe" OR "*\:\\WINDOWS\\System32\\RemoteFXvGPUDisablement.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\runscripthelper.exe" OR "*\:\\WINDOWS\\System32\\sdiagnhost.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\ServerManager.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\SyncAppvPublishingServer.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell_ise.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\winrshost.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\wsmprovhost.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell_ise.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\winrshost.exe" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\wsmprovhost.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("*\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\mscorsvw.exe"))))) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:("*\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\ SQL\ Server\ Management\ Studio*" OR "*\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ SQL\ Server\ Management\ Studio*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\IDE\\Ssms.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("*\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\ SQL\ Server\\*" OR "*\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ SQL\ Server\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\Tools\\Binn\\SQLPS.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\Citrix\\ConfigSync\\ConfigSyncRun.exe") OR (process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio\\*")) OR ((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\asgard2\-agent\\*" AND process.executable.text:("*\\thor64.exe" OR "*\\thor.exe"))) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text))))
